title: Autofactory
description: Bazel integration for the Google AutoFactory annotation processor.

title: Bash Runfiles
description: Macros for injecting the Bazel runfiles setup logic into shell scripts (and other files) at build time.

title: Concurrency
description: Kotlin concurrency infrastructure, complete with test doubles and Dagger integration.

title: Council
description: An experimental multi-agent system where AI agents interact, debate, and vote on topics.

title: Coroutines
description: Kotlin coroutine infrastructure, complete with test doubles and Dagger integration.

title: Dagger
description: Bazel macros for seamless Dagger KSP integration, solving 'Jar Hell' conflicts via shading.

title: Doctor Bashir
description: Common Bash utilities.

title: Formatting
description: Automated code formatting for a variety of languages and frameworks.

title: Klu
description: General-purpose Kotlin helpers and utilities, including concurrency primitives and Flow extensions.

title: KMonkey
description: Kotlin coroutine support for the JMonkeyEngine game engine.

title: Otter
description: An experimental coroutine-based framework for the JMonkeyEngine.

title: Presubmit
description: A custom continuous integration system for Bazel.

title: rules_hugo
description: Bazel ruleset for the Hugo static site generator.

title: Sasync
description: Asynchronous stream manipulation for Kotlin with support for standard IO.

title: Publicity
description: Infrastructure for managing build visibility via a standardized API and conformance system.

title: Site
description: The source code for this website.

title: Contributing
description: Directives for contributing to this repository.

title: Tofu
description: Infrastructure for working with Open Tofu.

title: Universal
description: Universal data models (count, frequency, etc.) that apply across all domains.

title: RxMvpAndroid
description: An framework for combining RxJava with the Model-View-Presenter architecture in Android applications.

title: SlidingIntroScreen
description: An Android library for customisable onboarding user interfaces.

title: Vertigo
description: An Android library for vertical pagination user interfaces.

title: Spyglass
description: An Android annotation processor that uses code generation to reduce boilerplate code in custom views.

title: Mixtape
description: An Android library for customisable media loading and playback, with support for automatic caching and background media loading.

title: FortyTwo
description: An Android library for question/answer user interfaces.

title: Shamir
description: A Java implementation of Shamir's Secret Sharing cryptography scheme, provides as an synchronous API, a reactive API, and a GUI application (for Mac, Windows, and Linux).

title: Retrial
description: A Gradle plugin that prevents supply chain attacks by cryptographically pinning dependencies and verifying their integrity.

title: Lumberjack
description: A logging framework for Java with zero dependencies.

title: SoundSword
description: An Android library for background audio playback and automatic playback state-tracking.

title: AndroidUtilities
description: General Android helper classes for common development tasks, including asset management, audio focus, and bitmap processing.

title: JavaUtilities
description: General Java utilities for common operations, including callback execution, file tree traversal, and null safety.

title: AndroidTestingTools
description: Testing tools for Android, including custom test harnesses, Espresso helpers for view interactions, and type-safe view actions/assertions.

title: Avatar
description: Generates Java source code elements to support annotation processor unit testing.

title: BoggleBuster
description: Solves the game of Boggle.
